long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to filter an event to only show the athletes in your conference? Want to see how your team stacks up with another team head to head? Wish that you could look at a handful of events at a large meet without all the scrolling? 

Look no further! This extension allows for TFRRS.org results pages to be filtered by team, year, and event. Multiple teams, years, and events can be filtered at the same time on both cross country and Compiled track results pages. TFRRS is a great source of truth for all collegiate results, use this extension to increase your efficiency by finding and sorting through all relevant results with a few clicks.

Add to Chrome & Sign up for a 24 hour FREE TRIAL to try it out yourself
After the free trial, there is a ONE-TIME $2 fee to support the development and maintenance of the extension. If you've already paid, select 'Log In' on the payment page.
